Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Combat supplies... ready.'}
{3: "The Gray Raven Commandant's room... located."}
{3: 'She reviews her previous training in her M.I.N.D.'}
{3: "One more thing—don't forget to smile."}
{3: "Don't. Forget. To smile."}
{3: 'She stands in front of the mirror and practices.'}
{3: "It's still not a pleasant smile, but at least it's no longer frightening."}
{3: "At the very least, it shouldn't make anyone mad."}
{3: 'Everything should be ready to go now.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'In every sense of the word, today should be an "ordinary" day.'}
{3: "No ground missions. No meetings. Today, you've spent the entire morning in the training room."}
{3: 'At noon, you visit the WGAA to collect the file you asked Ayla to help find, and plan on checking up on No. 21.'}
{3: "You weren't expecting your plans to go right out the window."}
{3: '—You now stand outside of your room, staring at the scene inside.'}
{3: "Prior to that, you never thought you'd be so shocked to see the state of your room."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I just walked by your room, Commandant. The door was open, so I saw...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...Commandant, I know you've been busy... But you still need to tidy up your room.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "At least pick up a little bit. You can't just throw everything on the ground like that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv seems to hesitate a moment.'}
{2: '?', 3: '27', 4: "What's wrong with my room?", 5: '27'}
{3: 'Your heart sinks. Rushing over to your room, you see that...'}
{3: 'The door is wide open, revealing the disaster within.'}
{3: 'All kinds of old toys, badges, glass bottles, cog boxes, and mechanical parts litter the ground.'}
{2: 'What happened?!', 3: '36', 4: "And why's there hypertune material?!", 5: '36'}
{3: 'With no clear place to step, you see a white Construct sitting among the mess, trying to stuff a strange CUB into a box.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "The door was open, so I let myself in. I couldn't find anyone, so I've been waiting for you here.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's all this on the ground...", 3: '41'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'For you, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "You helped me, so I should say thank you. Which I haven't.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Why are you thanking me for thanking you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'For the gift.', 3: '48'}
{3: 'No. 21 stands up and turns her back. Her shoulders move up and down as if taking several deep breaths, then she turns to face you.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Is my smile... really that scary?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Not at all. It's cute.", 3: '56', 4: 'A little...', 5: '58'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Looks like all that practice paid off.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 lowers her head and rubs her face with her hands completely covered by her sleeves.'}
{2: "...There's no difference!", 3: '63'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Really...? Then I guess... I still need practice.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 gets down on the ground like a small animal, looks up at you, then raises her hands like two paws.'}
{3: 'With the door still open, you hear some sounds of bewilderment coming from outside.'}
{2: 'Whoa! Whoa!! Whoa!!!!', 3: '71', 4: '(Close the door!)', 5: '71'}
{2: 'Where on earth did you learn that?', 3: '72'}
{3: 'Right then, the discussion outside the door seems to get louder.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'My machine for learning "emotions" broke.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'So I asked some people how to express "gratitude."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This is a "common way to express gratitude."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Quit learning all that nonsense.', 3: '78', 4: "Who on earth said that's common?!", 5: '78'}
{3: 'No. 21 bows her head. Her quiet gray eyes seem to express a look of confusion.'}
{2: 'Human emotions... are complicated.', 3: '82'}
{2: "There're a lot of different ways to express yourself.", 3: '83'}
{2: 'No need to rush.', 3: '84'}
{2: 'Just go at your own pace.', 3: '85'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "...I don't understand.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Your desire to protect Vera and Noctis...', 3: '87'}
{2: 'Your disappointment after being misunderstood...', 3: '88'}
{2: 'Your happiness after receiving a gift.', 3: '89'}
{2: "They're proof of your emotions.", 3: '90'}
{2: 'They belong to you.', 3: '91'}
{3: "People will feel sad, smile, sympathize, and decide things according to their own will. Heartless machines won't do that. Not like her. These emotions belong to her and her alone.."}
{2: 'If these emotions get too much for you...', 3: '93'}
{2: 'Others will help you share the burden.', 3: '94'}
{3: "You place the brand-new audio-visual terminal that you were holding in No. 21's hands."}
{2: 'That documentary on the lone white wolf you were watching...', 3: '98'}
{2: 'I checked with the WGAA and found the next episode.', 3: '99'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'That white wolf... I saw it go home.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "...I know that wasn't real though. It keeps wandering in the snow.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'This is the real ending.', 3: '102'}
{2: 'It finds a good home. I promise.', 3: '103'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'You really are a lot like Captain, but also not at the same time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Your scent is special, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'When I was in the lab, I never smelled anything like it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "...It's warm and kind. I like it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I want to have a "human scent."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I've thought you smelled nice ever since I first met you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As No. 21 stiffly attempts to convey her inner thoughts, she approaches you step-by-step.'}
{3: "She's just like a wild animal who bears their fangs at distant enemies and snuggles up to their trusted companions, snoring gently."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I feel different every time I see you, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "But I don't hate this feeling.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 stops talking. Her eyes are fixed on you.'}
{2: 'Why are you staring at me?', 3: '116'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Because I can't take my eyes off you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 tilts her head and appears to be contemplating if she said something wrong.'}
{3: "Her expression is so charming, you can't help but reach out and pet the top of her head."}
{3: 'Right as you are about to retract your hand, No. 21 lifts her head and rubs it against your hand, her soft cheeks touching your palm.'}
{3: 'Gradually, the artificial sunlight outside the window begins to set.'}
{3: 'Warm light fills the room, enveloping you and No. 21 in a warm glow.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, you notice that the sunlight is as warm as it was the first day you met.'}
{3: 'After making just a brief appearance in her life, you hold her hand.'}
